        @GetMapping(value="/medicalRecords")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.List<MedicalRecordDto>> getAllMedicalRecords()
        Handle HTTP GET request on medical records collection.
        Returns:
        HTTP 200 Response with a list of all medical records

      • getMedicalRecord

        @GetMapping(value="/medicalRecords/medicalRecord")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<MedicalRecordDto> getMedicalRecord(@RequestParam @NotBlank(message="Firstname is mandatory")
                                                                                                                                      @NotBlank(message="Firstname is mandatory") java.lang.String firstName,
                                                                                                                                      @RequestParam @NotBlank(message="LastName is mandatory")
                                                                                                                                      @NotBlank(message="LastName is mandatory") java.lang.String lastName)
                                                                                                                               throws ResourceNotFoundException
        Handle HTTP GET request on a medical record resource with the firstName and lastName.
        Parameters:
        firstName - of the medical record
        lastName - of the medical record
        Returns:
        HTTP 200 Response with the medical record
        Throws:
        ResourceNotFoundException - when the medical record is not found

        Parameters:
        medicalRecord - to create

        @DeleteMapping(value="/medicalRecord")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.Void> deleteMedicalRecord(@RequestParam @NotBlank(message="Firstname is mandatory")
